title: How to buff OTHER summs so that Flash is not mandatory?
body:
Flash is here to stay. But if you want to have constructive discussion you should be thinking about how to buff the other summoner spells. Namely:

Ghost
Heal
Barrier
Exhaust
Teleport
Cleanse
Ignite

In addition to tuning CDs, here are some ideas for each summoner spell. Options are very limited though.

Ghost: slow resistance
Heal: slow resistance, AoE
Barrier: increase amount/duration
Exhaust: increase amount, maybe some kind of anti-tenacity
Teleport: nothing other than CD, but this is pretty busted in pro play as is
Cleanse: nothing other than CD
Ignite: probably fine the way it is
